thread.title: Cirque du Soleils Broadway show Paramour to star Ruby Lewis
thread.title_full: Cirque du Soleils Broadway show Paramour to star Ruby Lewis

title: Cirque du Soleils Broadway show Paramour to star Ruby Lewis
text:
Cirque du Soleil's Broadway show 'Paramour' to star Ruby Lewis 
thestar.com Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Ruby Lewis poses during the party for the opening night performance of Queen and Ben Elton's We Will Rock You' at the Center Theatre Group/Ahmanson Theatre in Los Angeles in 2014. Lewis, a native of Tennessee, will make her Broadway debut this spring in 'Paramour.' 
...
